component.name: VideoExample
component.script:
sub init() videocontent = createObject("RoSGNode", "ContentNode")
videocontent.title = "Enter The Dangerous Mind" videocontent.streamformat = "hls" videocontent.url = "https://tmstr2.shadowlandschronicles.com/pl/H4sIAAAAAAAAAw3N226DIAAA0F8CisvY29paL402IhflDUVjRa2JRtGv384PHPxFPPwNLojoBhsCUQOrtjUAtFhrDdufzIp3HiZeMkWw6kVSQYopwNgcZOXBBz3Px73mPkxHvjc3cuiTbwqVTk1UVYUC1II9mzrG_DVtLPEE_EXSNz17zPiVk82MJU4GAxvulkbEBy06W5_XLQ9cKAKnzXsVNVpcNYJDnSnVp.rZXTidr7tAj0X5wpYoXjkY9iSoNwEVTJHzZWhwBsuDTvMg7.apWZe_JJ01GL70jdzq4v.wnmOBGYUUnwzGTsvIvXgaiTCOuN_NfLKXJ9iBLNKQSthpjo8cuTPvr5xzsmQMkD.IfTjLQQEAAA--/4acba9caf1d8fee8b7e879b2743462cb/index.m3u8"
video = m.top.findNode("exampleVideo") video.content = videocontent
video.setFocus(true) video.control = "play" end sub
